1361770.name: Fantasy Grounds - Austeria JumpStart
1361770.description:
Manual Download Link
Austeria JumpStart
The fantasy kingdom of Caladon was overrun in the first act of the War of the Wild. Survivors fled across the Jorna River seeking sanctuary among their Trader Imperium neighbors.
The Warlock Tahn and his army of Wild-mutated abominations took the former capital of Caladon Falls for themselves, gathering their forces while Tahn struck a deal with an even greater evil....
It's time for true heroes to awaken.
Product contains:
  • A full adventure
  • There's also setting background information
  • New character options available to any Austeria hero
  • Six pre-gen heroes to get you playing fast!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jeannette Jarrar
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
